lead_paragraph: David Nalbandian beat Roger Federer yesterday, 1-6, 6-3, 6-3, to win the Madrid Masters. On his way to the final against Federer, the world’s top-ranked player, Nalbandian also defeated No. 2 Rafael Nadal and No. 3 Novak Djokovic.Nalbandian broke Federer three times and became the second player this year to beat the top three players en route to winning a title. Djokovic did it in Montreal in August, culminating his run with a victory over Federer.
